name: federation.p1k3.com
description: federation.p1k3.com is brennen's several-user Mastodon instance (a few friends and family may have accounts at any given time; registrations will not be opened because I do not have the brainspace for real moderation tasks here). This instance runs on masto.host, and is thus bound by masto.host's ToS, which bar instances dedicated to racism, Nazi shit, transphobia, misogyny, incitement to violence, and the rest of the usual litany of horrors.
